manthri dhura 159k thora path kara ganimata adala chanda wimasima sandaha palath dekata ayath disthrik hayen paksha ha swadhina kandayam niyojanaya karamin apekshakayan thun dahas hath siya anu hathara (3794) denek tharaga karana bawa niyojya mathiwarana komasaris em.em mohamad mahatha prakasha keleya.mewara mathiwarana rajakari sandaha rajya sewakayan haththa dahasaka (70,000) pirisak yodawa athayi da owun siya rajakari katayuthu akuratama kriyathmaka karana bawa da ee mahatha sandahan keleya.
